**Title**{.underline title}
Pressure Switch
**French Translation:** : Contacteur Manométrique

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01008428
**Solicitation Number**: W8485-237322

**Publication Date** : September 28, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** October 13, 2022, 2:00 PM (Easter Time)

**Category Classification**
Procurement Category: Government Department (GD)
Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding

**Notice Type** : Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Trade Agreements Combination:**
Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
**Regions of Delivery**: Quebec Excluding the National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity Information:**
Department of National Defence|
101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2

**Description of Requirements:** The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for a pressure switch, detailed under the following:

Section 1. GSIN: N5930, NSN: 5930-01-395-1713
- Pressure Switch
- Quantity: Ten
- Unit of Issue: Each
Equivalent or substitute products must be identified, and a Certificate of Conformance from the Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) must be provided.

Note that the materials are not subject to the Controlled Goods Program.

**Attachments:** Two documents are provided: one in English and one in French

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/18aa0d9734a221a241bcd658c677bfbf/w8485-237322_en_v2.pdf (English)
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/28/028a3dd03ea024038ebd5fc6ea09aa19/w8485-237322_fr_v2.pdf (French)
